name: Space Cheetah Hyper Runner DEMO
description:
Get the full game on Steam: Space Cheetah Hyper Runner

Space Cheetah Hyper Runner is a 3D sci-fi sandbox racing game where you build up speed and make epic ramps across entire levels!

Surf satellites!

Play low gravity space soccer!

Bounce off trampoline nets!

Leap from tumbling solar panels!

There are also hidden Ghost Node anomalies you can collect to unlock the mysterious story of the Traveler's journey across the solar system.
